text: @donwinslow @debsomewhere I agree that Kushner is an idiot, but he’s not the main reason the Trump Administration failed to respond properly to the COVID-19 crisis. Donald Trump has that honor. The buck doesn’t stop at Trump’s son-in-law; it stops at Trump.
